subroutine heapsort(a)
  implicit none
  integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: a
  integer(8) :: i, n, l, ir, j,儿
  integer(8) :: r

  n = size(a) if (n .le. 1) then
    return
  end if

  l = n / 2 + 1
  do while (l >= 1) l = l - 1
    r = a(l) i = l
    j = i * 2
    if (j <= n) then
      do while (j <= n) if (j < n) then
          if (a(j) < a(j+1)) then
            j = j + 1
          end if
        end if
        if (r < a(j)) then
          a(i) = a(j) i = j
        else
          j = n + 1
        end if
        j = 2 * i
      end do
      a(i) = r
    else
      a(l) = r
    end if
  end do
end subroutine heapsort

subroutine heapsort(n,array)
    integer(8), allocatable, intent(inout) :: array(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: n
    integer :: i, j, l
    integer(8) :: t
    l = n / 2 + 1
    do while (l >= 2)
        l = l - 1
        t = array(l)
        i = l
        j = l + l
        do while (j <= n)
            if (j < n) then
                if (array(j) < array(j+1)) then 
                    j = j + 1
                end if
            end if
            if (t < array(j)) then
                array(i) = array(j)
                i = j
                j = j + j
            else
                j = n + 1
            end if
        end do
        array(i) = t
    end do
end subroutine heapsort

Here's an idea to implement heapsort for integer arrays in 8 bytes:

Here's a Heapsort routine in Fortran (adapted from Wikipedia):

subroutine heapsort(a)
  implicit none
  integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: a
  integer :: n, i, ir, j, l
  integer(8) :: r
  n = size(a)
  if (n .lt. 1) return
  l = n / 2 + 1
  do while (l >= 1)
     l = l - 1
     r = a(l)
     i = l
     j = l * 2
     if (j <= n) then
        do while (j <= n)
           if (j < n) then
              if (a(j) < a(j+1)) j = j+1
           end if
           if (r < a(j)) then
              a(i) = a(j)
              i = j
              j = i * 2
           else
              j = n + 1
           end if
        end do
        a(i) = r
     else
        a(l) = r
     end if
  end do
  return
end subroutine heapsort

    integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: a
    integer :: i, n, left, l, ir, j    ! variables

                l = ir
                ir = l * 2
            else

            end if

        implicit none
        integer(8), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: a
        integer :: n, i, les, li, j, ir

                    li = ir
                    ir = li *2
                else
                    ir = n+1
                end if

    end subroutine heapsort
